name: @truefrontier/claude-dev-workflow
description: An automated software development pipeline that uses Claude AI to guide issues through structured development stages with human oversight.
author: True Frontier

scripts.setup:labels: node -e "const os = require('os'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const script = os.platform() === 'win32' ? 'scripts/setup-labels.bat' : './scripts/setup-labels.sh'; try { execSync(script, { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Setup failed:', error.message); process.exit(1); }"
